history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2. qsimpl time: 1 use: CV_radius_Reals_2,CVN_r.

exceptions.tactic: apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H as [r Hr].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) -> exists r : posreal, CVU (fun (n : nat) (x0 : R) => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => a k * x0 ^ k) n) (PSeries a) x r" on hypothesis of type "is_pseries a x l".

original: intros H. apply CV_radius_Reals_2 in H as [r Hr]. unfold continuity_pt. apply CVN_r in Hr. intros eps Heps.
